item.title: About me
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: Leer en español I am a Staff Software Engineer at Rebrandly. My main focus is driving technical stability and modernization in complex, high-scale systems. I am focused on reducing technical risk, improving maintainability, and enabling sustainable delivery. Previously, I was Senior Software Engineer at Flywire, working in the Engineering Productivity team. Before that, I spent several years working at Telefónica, in Aura’s cognitive team. I am also the former head of technology at Bufete de Marketing (now inteliens), former developer at Drivies, and intelligenia (now part of Nazaríes IT).
